instanceVariables.name: Bubble_X
instanceVariables.desc: An integer for the X-value to spawn the dialog speech bubble at.

instanceVariables.name: Bubble_Y
instanceVariables.desc: An integer for the Y-value to spawn the dialog speech bubble at.

instanceVariables.name: Bubble_Graphic_Variant
instanceVariables.desc: A string which indicates which dialog speech bubble to use for the graphics.

instanceVariables.name: Story_X
instanceVariables.desc: An integer for the X-value to be used in loading the next dialog (in the Dialogs JSON).

instanceVariables.name: Story_Y
instanceVariables.desc: An integer for the Y-value to be used in loading the next dialog (in the Dialogs JSON).

instanceVariables.name: Story_Z
instanceVariables.desc: A "sort of" unique integer ID. Also the integer for the Y-value to be used in loading the next dialog (in the Dialogs JSON).

instanceVariables.name: Story_Next_X
instanceVariables.desc: An integer for the next value to load as the Story_X variable.

instanceVariables.name: Story_Next_Y
instanceVariables.desc: An integer for the next value to load as the Story_Y variable.

instanceVariables.name: Name
instanceVariables.desc: A string for the name of NPC.

instanceVariables.name: NPC_Current_Status
instanceVariables.desc: A string which indicates the status of a NPC (i.e. "Dead").

instanceVariables.name: Active_on_Layer
instanceVariables.desc: A string which indicates which Layout this NPC should be active on.

instanceVariables.name: Active
instanceVariables.desc: A boolean indicating if the NPC should be ignored or not.

instanceVariables.name: Next_Action
instanceVariables.desc: This is a string indicating which keyword to execute in the next DialogsExecuteLogic function.

instanceVariables.name: Choice
instanceVariables.desc: A boolean indicating if the next dialog to be shown contains a choice.

instanceVariables.name: Cancel
instanceVariables.desc: A boolean indicating if the dialog should be interrupted on the next step.

instanceVariables.name: Immovable
instanceVariables.desc: A boolean indicating if a NPC can or cannot be moved. (Used to move NPCs.)
